description: Tsubasa Ohzora`s life has been saved by a football as he were 2 years old. Since then his best friend was the football, soccer is his life. As a 12-year old he and his mother are moving to Nankatsu (his father is captain on a ship and therefore on the sea most of the time). There he finds a soccer team to play in and many new friends. That`s the beginning of the successful story of Tsubasa and his friends...
